ComicInfo.Title: Untold Tales, Part 3
ComicInfo.Series: G.I. Joe: A Real American Hero
ComicInfo.Summary: A G.I. Joe team has just rescued geologist Dr. Tang from a Cobra Terror Drome in Frusenland. A Cobra force pursues the Joes, requiring the team to adopt special winter climate tactics.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-05-21 07:17:14. [CVDB828260] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-09 14:38:55. [Issue ID 2195972]
ComicInfo.Colorist: Cullen Davis,James Offredi,Luis Antonio Delgado,Luis Antonio Delgado
ComicInfo.CoverArtist: Cullen Davis,Dan Schoening,Jagdish Kumar,James Offredi,Jamie Sullivan,John Royle,Luis Antonio Delgado
ComicInfo.Characters: G.I. Joe [Snow Job,Blizzard],Cobra [Snow Serpents,Frostbite,Iceberg,A.V.A.C. Pilot],Techno Viper,Cover Girl,Dr. Jen Tang,Low-Light
